Restaurant Manager Job at Uncle Stans Food




        
    

        
        Uncle Stans Food is a quick service restaurant (QSR) , a fast-food model built for speed and convenience, featuring a limited, standardized menu of items like small shops or pizza. Operating primarily through counter-service and drive-thrus, it focuses on rapid food assembly from pre-prepared components, ensuring consistent, affordable meals delivered in minutes. Our functional, casual environment prioritizes efficient turnover over prolonged dining, making it a dominant global industry by fulfilling the demand for reliable, on-the-go satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Manager
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Job Description


	Oversee daily restaurant operations, including opening/closing procedures, food preparation, cleanliness, and inventory management. Ensure compliance with health, safety, and sanitation standards.
	Recruit, train, schedule, and motivate team members. Foster a positive and productive work environment, promoting teamwork and professional growth.
	Ensure every guest receives outstanding service, promptly addressing any concerns or feedback to maintain high customer satisfaction.
	Monitor sales, control costs, manage labor budgets, and optimize profitability. Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly reports as required.
	Uphold our brand’s standards for food quality, presentation, and consistency. Conduct regular inspections to ensure adherence to company policies.
	Support local marketing initiatives, drive sales through promotions, and identify opportunities to increase customer engagement and loyalty.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: emmy@unclestansfoods.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Growth Marketing Lead",
  "description": "Guufs International Ltd is a global technology company, focused on building digital publishing platforms and providing tech and marketing consulting services. With a strong emphasis on innovation, the company delivers insightful content on AI, digital tools, and business growth, while also helping creators and businesses develop smart digital strategies. Through a remote-first approach and a commitment to empowering entrepreneurs, Guufs International Ltd connects people with the technologies and ideas they need to succeed in today&rsquo;s digital world.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Growth Marketing Lead

Job Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;Lagos

Description


	We are preparing for a soft launch and early growth phase. Building a product designed to create real value for creators, entrepreneurs, and businesses,and we believe in moving fast.
	We are looking for an experienced growth marketing leadwho can help us generate momentum, validate positioning, and drive early adoption within a short timeframe.
	As Marketing Lead, you will own our brand growth strategy and execution across all major digital channels. This is a hands-on role requiring both strategic thinking and fast execution.
	You will work closely with the founders and product team to ensure marketing aligns with reality, delivers measurable traction, and supports rapid iteration.


Key Responsibilities
Growth &amp; Strategy:


	Design and execute a short and long-term growth strategy focused on rapid traction
	Identify and test high-leverage growth opportunities
	Continuously analyse performance and optimise based on data


Digital Marketing Execution:


	Lead email marketing (launch sequences, onboarding, retention)
	Optimise web and conversion funnels
	Drive organic and paid social media growth
	Plan and execute paid advertising campaigns
	Shape and execute content marketing and positioning.


Collaboration &amp; Leadership:


	Work directly with founders on messaging and go-to-market strategy
	Align marketing efforts with product development
	Set clear KPIs and report meaningful insights.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree with experience in digital marketing or growth roles
	Proven experience driving growth in startups or fast-moving environments
	Strong understanding of funnels, performance marketing, and user psychology
	Ability to execute quickly without heavy oversight
	Comfortable working in ambiguous, high-pressure environments.


Nice to Have:


	Experience leading early-stage launches
	Strong copywriting and storytelling skills
	Hands-on experience with paid media platforms (Meta, Google, LinkedIn, etc.).


What We Offer


	Salary: N100,000 monthly.
	High-impact role at a critical stage of the company
	Direct access to decision-makers
	Freedom to experiment and move fast
	Competitive compensation with upside based on performance.

	High level of integrity, discipline, and attention to detail.


Key Skills:


	Strong interpersonal and communication skills

	Integrity and ethical judgement.

	Identify and evaluate suppliers based on cost, quality, and delivery performance
	Prepare purchase orders, contracts, and maintain procurement documentation

	Coordinate with stores, production, service, and accounts teams
	Monitor inventory levels and plan purchases to avoid shortages or excess stock
	Follow up with suppliers to ensure timely delivery
	Verify invoices, GRNs, and support finance for payment processing
	Conduct market research to identify cost-saving opportunities
	Ensure compliance with company procurement policies and procedures.

	Bachelor’s degree / Diploma in Business, Supply Chain, Mechanical, or related field
	2–5 years of experience in purchasing or procurement
	Automobile or engineering industry experience preferred but not mandatory.
